title: I Bought a $1400 Gaming Pre-Built From Aliexpress...
description: Head to  to save 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain using code: DAWID  I bought a $1400 pre-built gaming PC from Aliexpress, and it was a roller-coaster of emotions.  For some Noob-Friendly, Dawid-approved T-shirts, and more, shop   -Here is a link to my Patreon page, it would be awesome if you check it out:   *Affiliate links* below to some of the products I use or mention in the video:  Amazon - Intel Core i7-10700:  - EVGA Power Supply:  - BenQ Monitor:  - Trident Z RGB 16gb ddr4 RAM:   Other Retailers: - Intel Core i7-10700:  - Asus RTX 2060:  - EVGA Power Supply:  - BenQ Monitor:  - RAM 16gb ddr4:   -Follow me on whichever Social media you don't hate- Discord:  Twitch:  Twitch shorts channel:  YouTube:
